name: Pacific Bus Museum
description: Collection of 20+ fully-restored running buses from the 1920s-1990s. Open 1st and 3rd Saturday, 10am-2pm. $5 donation for adults.
fullDescription: Collection of 20+ fully-restored running buses from the 1920s-1990s. Open 1st and 3rd Saturday, 10am-2pm. $5 donation for adults.
keywords: Pacific Bus Museum, Fremont, vintage buses, transportation history, restored buses, 1920s-1990s, $5 donation
